entries.title: Chromatic Drones
entries.summary: Looping nocturnal textures tuned for deep focus rituals.
entries.content: An evolving suite of drones recorded with analogue synth layers and feedback delay networks. Includes session notes, tuning charts, and an embedded player once assets are uploaded.

entries.title: Pulse Sketches
entries.summary: Percussive prototypes for live manipulation on performance floors.
entries.content: Modular rhythms assembled in Hydra and Ableton Link. The collection pairs notated diagrams with audio stems for remixing.

entries.title: Archive Reworks
entries.summary: Ambient suites conjured from found stems and field recordings.
entries.content: Dissected stems from the project archive reassembled into long-form ambient suites. Pair with photo essays and patch notes for each iteration.
